org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor

类 TaskExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcEndpoint
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor.TaskExecutor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RpcGateway, TaskExecutorGateway

    public class TaskExecutor
extends RpcEndpoint
implements TaskExecutorGateway
    TaskExecutor implementation. The task executor is responsible for the execution of multiple Task.

    • 方法详细资料

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: RpcEndpoint
        Starts the rpc endpoint. This tells the underlying rpc server that the rpc endpoint is ready to process remote procedure calls. IMPORTANT: Whenever you override this method, call the parent implementation to enable rpc processing. It is advised to make the parent call last.
        覆盖:
        start 在类中 RpcEndpoint
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - indicating that something went wrong while starting the RPC endpoint

      • postStop

        public void postStop()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Called to shut down the TaskManager. The method closes all TaskManager services.
        覆盖:
        postStop 在类中 RpcEndpoint
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs. The exception is returned as result of the termination future.

      • triggerCheckpoint

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> triggerCheckpoint(ExecutionAttemptID executionAttemptID,
                                                                             long checkpointId,
                                                                             long checkpointTimestamp,
                                                                             CheckpointOptions checkpointOptions)
        从接口复制的说明: TaskExecutorGateway
        Trigger the checkpoint for the given task. The checkpoint is identified by the checkpoint ID and the checkpoint timestamp.
        指定者:
        triggerCheckpoint 在接口中 TaskExecutorGateway
        参数:
        executionAttemptID - identifying the task
        checkpointId - unique id for the checkpoint
        checkpointTimestamp - is the timestamp when the checkpoint has been initiated
        checkpointOptions - for performing the checkpoint
        返回:
        Future acknowledge if the checkpoint has been successfully triggered

      • requestSlot

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> requestSlot(SlotID slotId,
                                                                       JobID jobId,
                                                                       AllocationID allocationId,
                                                                       java.lang.String targetAddress,
                                                                       ResourceManagerId resourceManagerId,
                                                                       Time timeout)
        从接口复制的说明: TaskExecutorGateway
        Requests a slot from the TaskManager
        指定者:
        requestSlot 在接口中 TaskExecutorGateway
        参数:
        slotId - slot id for the request
        jobId - for which to request a slot
        allocationId - id for the request
        targetAddress - to which to offer the requested slots
        resourceManagerId - current leader id of the ResourceManager
        timeout - for the operation
        返回:
        answer to the slot request
